en.intro_message:
[h3]All data is stored only locally in the local Stores your browser. No data is transmitted to our servers. [small]This means as well, you should be the settings in your browser is set to "for delete all data when closing the browser" enabled under certain circumstances, all your data, the ToDo list will be lost.[/small][/h3]

[blockquote]a) create your own settings under the list (s)
b) then create your to-dos in your list[/blockquote]
